ack.p: The authors would like to thank the personnel, teachers, especially J. Stingeder and students of Class 12A of PHS Sacré Coeur in Pressbaum for assisting in rearing larval toads, and L. Jókai, D. Schubert, R. Sasse, L. Zechmeister, J. Ploderer, J. Ujszegi, K. Szabó and B. D. Üveges for help in performing the experiments. Funding was provided by a Sparkling Science Project of the Federal Ministry of Science and Research, Austria (BMWF, SPA 04/171), an FP7 Marie Curie Career Integration Grant (PCIG13-GA-2013-631722), and the “Lendület” program of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences (MTA, LP2012-24/2012).
